name: Super Speed Linkup
description:
Try it, Do it, Have Fun! Best Linkup game!!!

Exercise hand eye coordination, as soon as possible the customs clearance, get 3 stars!

Rich props allow you to easily pass!

[Feture]
1. App provie story and challenge mode.
2. multiple theme (food, animal, fruit...)

[Rule]
The aim of the game is to remove all tiles from the board.
1. Only two matching tiles can be removed at a time.
2. Two tiles can be removed only if they can be connected with a maximum of three lines.
3. Lines can be only horizontal or vertical, but not diagonal.
4. Lines may cross only the empty border.
